762090.name: Cally's Caves 4 - OST
762090.description:
This DLC includes the complete soundtrack for Cally's Caves 4! The Soundtrack comes in MP3 format (320kbps) and includes 43 songs.
Tracklist:
1 - Cally Theme
2 - Engineer Theme
3 - Trailer
4 - Sam Theme
5 - Robin Theme
6 - Badlands Outpost
7 - Avalon Theme
8 - Kana Theme
9 - The Path to Avalon
10 - Rupert Theme

13 - Horizon
14 - Herbert Theme
15 - Trap
16 - Jade Helm
17 - Revelations
18 - Doctor Theme
19 - A Purpose
20 - Throwback
21 - Open Fields
22 - Magnus Theme
23 - Last Ride
24 - Golem Theme
25 - Introductions
26 - Dark Mirror
27 - Lost
28 - Rise Up
29 - G.S.S. Headquarters
30 - Architect Theme
31 - Blast Doors
32 - Electric
33 - Showdown

39 - The Path Forward

43 - Daybreak
